document.heading: Environmental Policy and Hazardous and Solid Waste Temporary Amendment Act of 1992

history.narrative: Law 9-149, the “Environmental Policy and Hazardous and Solid Waste Temporary Amendment Act of 1992,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 9-522. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on May 6, 1992, and June 2, 1992, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on June 19, 1992, it was assigned Act No. 9-229 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 9-149 became effective on September 10, 1992.
